rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
At the beginning of your end step, if you cast another noncreature spell this turn, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
Crew 3
notes:
!tokens Junk

PH Note 1.20: Made it a 2/2 and changed to crew 2. Now you can play it as a 1 mana 2/2 with flying but that seems undesirable so I don't think people will. The scale is better making it a 3 mana 3/3, 4 mana 4/4, and 5 mana 5/5 etc. Added lifelink to ensure it's better than wreckyard crane. Possibly too much juice though maybe first strike is better.
